title: Error 404: Page Not Found
solution: To fix the Error 404, ensure that the requested URL exists and the server is correctly configured to handle it.

title: TypeError: Cannot read property 'X' of undefined
solution: The 'TypeError: Cannot read property 'X' of undefined' occurs when you try to access a property of an undefined object. To solve it, check if the object exists before accessing its properties.

title: SyntaxError: Unexpected token Y
solution: The 'SyntaxError: Unexpected token Y' is typically due to a syntax mistake in your code. Double-check the line indicated in the error message and fix any syntax errors.
